trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> objects.
The ProviderSettingsCollection class represents the `providers` element within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: La classe rappresenta ProviderSettingsCollection il `providers` elemento all'interno di un file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object to the collection.
Use the Add method to add a <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Add per aggiungere un <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>oggetto alla raccolta.</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object to add.
Clears the collection.
Use the Clear method to remove all <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Clear per rimuovere tutti <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>oggetti dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to get or set a specified <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object contained within this <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la propriet√† dell'elemento da ottenere o impostare un oggetto di <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>oggetto contenuto all'interno di questa <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> to return.
The specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref>.
Gets an item from the collection.
A string reference to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Riferimento a una stringa per il <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"> </xref> oggetto all'interno della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object contained in the collection.
To be added.
Removes an element from the collection.
Use the Remove method to remove a specified <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Remove per rimuovere un oggetto specificato <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>oggetto dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere.
